page.title: 10SHOPS IN MORTEHOE
page.content: There are four main shops in the village. "Sid's" sells fruit and vegetables and a small selection of standby groceries. In the summer they open 7 days a week, but in the winter they only open 6 days for shorter hours. The General Stores stocks all the usual groceries, frozen foods and dairy products. They also sell Scrumpy to visitors. They are open 7 days a week in summer, but close in winter. The Post Office also sells news- papers, tobacco, sweets, gifts, etc. The Bakery makes a wide selection of bread, rolls, cakes and pasties, baking from 10pm till 2pm next day in summer, and continuing 3 times a week in winter. There are 3 cafes also selling gifts, 3 pubs and a take-away.
